tool.name: Union
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayInputEntity1 False isArrayInputEntity2 False output_data_Result $output_data_Result name Union InputEntity1 $InputEntity1 InputEntity2 $InputEntity2 prefer $prefer response $response outputType_Result $OutputSection_Result.outputType_Result transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: InputEntity1
param.label: the first geometry
param.help: the first geometry to compare against. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: InputEntity2
param.label: the other geometry
param.help: the other geometry to compare against. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_Result
param.label: The union of two geometries
param.help: The geometry representing the union of the two geometries.

tool.help: This service shall return a bag of geometry values representing a Point set union of geometry InputEntity1 with geometry InputEntity2.
